radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver echotexture appears relatively homogeneous. Normal direction of flow is seen in the portal vein. The gallbladder appears unremarkable, without evidence of stones. The common duct is not dilated. The right kidney measures 11.3 cm. Left kidney measures 11.4 cm. There is no evidence of hydronephrosis or stones. Spleen appears unremarkable. Visualized portions of the pancreas head and body appear unremarkable, although assessment of the tail is limited by abdominal gas.
